name: mk - k = f
description:
(If the game doesn't appear, try Firefox.)

This was created within 48 hours for The Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018. The theme was GENRE without MECHANIC so I made a FIGHTING GAME without all the pesky FIGHTING that gets in the way of the finishing moves.

Match the 4 arrow sequence using ASDW or the arrow keys to FINISH HIM!! Perform several fatalities in a row to get a high score. Send your screenshots to @53xy83457 for some friendly competition.
